reviews.review_msg: Easy class, straight forward.  Assignments super straight forward and short.  Tests were verbatim from her notes and outlines.  Easy A without opening textbook

Seemed like a new interim professor, no power point slides, just had outlines. Exams are quite difficult have to know material inside and out. And once again, NO POWERPOINTS, first time in three years a lecture did not have a power point. That's a first so if you're a visual learner like me, well tough luck.
